name: Monsters and Spirits
description:
Are you tired of standing there and harvesting monsters waiting in line to die in boredom?

Are you tired of the monotony of skill combinations?

In the demon spirit, you can completely free yourself from these boredom

More interesting monster mechanisms, more diverse skill combinations, and more unexpected surprises for you

A lawn mowing robot that allows you to fully unleash your imagination and combines pleasure and excitement, allowing you to experience unprecedented joy

antic



Always pay attention to the movements of the Lantern Monster, as it will steal your experience stones. You can use it to help you collect those disadvantaged experience stones, but be careful to let them run away!

Pay attention to the randomly appearing banshees on the map. They will provide you with powerful buffs, but be sure to bring more money with you

Be flexible in using your storage skill bar and choose a killing plan when facing different enemies
